## Source: ossf-package-analysis (55bcc3528361d6d5067b05fd50e31f38dc1805f162e37628da89fac588e74dd7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'newman-reporter-genuinepoc' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
